_source.text: 1. EARL THOMAS, F.S. 2. J.BEST,RB faster and better than Spiller 3. MIKE WILLIAMS, WR syracuse 4. J.JERRY, OL 4. trade Sweeney ..... J.GRAHAM,TE from the U 6 (3 picks) LB, LB, LB (maybe Muckleroy, Schoenfield,Micah Johnson) 7 (3 picks) Kafka,QB nw, and BPA, BPA

text: 1. EARL THOMAS, F.S. 2. J.BEST,RB faster and **better** **than** Spiller 3. **MIKE** **WILLIAMS**, WR syracuse 4

_source.text: 3 points: Eric Mack liked James Starks and Grant (good, so-so), disliked Ingram and Pierre Thomas (on the money), knew Ray Rice would light it up, missed on Mendenhall and Blount, hit on Best, thought the Chiefs backfield would be better than it was, overestimated Chris Johnson, undervalued Cedric Benson, wrongly joined the anti-Hightower chorus, hit a home run with Beanie Wells, and got it wrong with Jones and Knowshon Moreno.

text: 3 points: Eric Mack liked James Starks and Grant (good, so-so), disliked Ingram and Pierre Thomas (on the money), knew **Ray** **Rice** would light it up, missed on Mendenhall and Blount, hit on Best, thought the Chiefs backfield would be **better** **than** it was, overestimated Chris Johnson, undervalued Cedric Benson, wrongly joined the anti-Hightower chorus, hit a home run with Beanie Wells, and got it wrong with Jones and **Knowshon** **Moreno**.

_source.text: A couple quick hits on some of the other comments...sorry but I know he's only a rookie and plays for my favorite team, so I'm probably biased a little, but if he holds true and gets better, Mike Williams will be better than Ocho, if not already better than him.

text: A couple quick hits on some of the other comments...sorry but I know he's only a rookie and plays for my favorite team, so I'm probably biased a little, but if he holds true and gets better, **Mike** **Williams** will be **better** **than** Ocho, if not already **better** **than** him.
